name: 3 O'Clock Train to Apocalypse
description:
In the dreaded Double-Apocalyptic future, run, shoot, and loot your way to victory. Evade or kill zombies and aliens alike in this over the top third person shooter. Use what scrap still remains in the world to upgrade your arsenal and survive as long as possible!

Credits:
Dinah Baum (Programmer)
Calvin Dao (Programmer)
Chase Odom (Programmer)
Brandon Head (Tech Artist/Scrum Master)
Clarissa Chacon (Artist)
John Luke Horlador (Artist)
Mabry Schlenker (Artist)
Samuel Choi (Sound Designer)
